settings.title: Buy it with
While this product is out of stock, consider...

settings.text: After years of relentless innovation building the world's best wireless gaming headset, Audeze presents Maxwell, designed from the ground up for serious gamers. Sound quality, wireless performance, and battery life are all pushed to new extremes, along with the latest spatial audio features and multi-platform compatibility.

settings.author: Raghav Somani
settings.content: The Audeze Maxwell, simply put, is the greatest Wireless Headphone ever made. Not just because it's the best headphones in the world - for gamers, but also because the incredible technology packed inside  makes it light years ahead of everything else out there.

custom_css: .text-subdued {font-size: 14px; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; font-weight: 700; font-size: 14pxrem; letter-spacing: 2px; text-transform: uppercase; color: #444444; align-self: center;}

settings.title: Planar Magnetic Drivers. Unmatched Sound.
settings.content: Maxwell harnesses the cutting-edge potential of Audeze's advanced 90mm planar magnetic drivers. Thats 3x larger drivers than any other competitors. This unique configuration allows Maxwell to deliver commanding bass and unparalleled precision in sound reproduction. Trusted and utilized by top recording studios and game developers worldwide, Audeze drivers incorporate patented technologies such as Uniforce™ voice coils, Fluxor™ magnets, and Fazor™ waveguides, ensuring unrivalled audio performance. With Maxwell, you can experience exceptional high-resolution sound, supporting up to 24-bit/96kHz over Wireless or USB connections.

settings.title: Trusted by Grammy-Winning Artists. Loved by Professional Gamers.
settings.content: Grammy-winning sound engineers trust Audeze headphones for their unmatched sound quality. With cutting-edge technology and meticulous engineering, Audeze delivers a true-to-life listening experience that stands out in both music and gaming. Whether you're in a recording studio, an esports arena, or simply an audiophile, Audeze offers an unparalleled audio experience, crafted for the world’s most discerning ears.

settings.title: Boasting 80 Hours of Uninterrupted Gaming. Just Incredible.
settings.content: Audeze Maxwell is purpose-built for extended gaming sessions, featuring a powerful 1800 mAh Lithium-Polymer battery that ensures uninterrupted gameplay for up to 80 hours in wireless mode. Additionally, the headset is equipped with quick charging capabilities, allowing you to achieve a 25% battery level in just 20 minutes. With this impressive battery performance and fast charging, you'll have all-day support even during your busiest gaming moments.

settings.title: Ultra-Low Latency Wireless Connectivity. Seamless. Stable. Stellar.
settings.content: Game with unwavering assurance, benefiting from stable connectivity and an impressive 3X range compared to standard 2.4GHz wireless, ensuring you stay synchronised with the on-screen action. Immerse in exceptional lossless high-resolution audio, made possible by cutting-edge wireless technology supporting LC3plus, LE Audio, and LDAC. Effortlessly switch between multiple devices with the convenience of Bluetooth Multipoint, adding versatility to your gaming experience.

settings.title: The Best-Ever Noise Filtering Microphones. Now Powered With A.I.
settings.content: Elevate your communication with Audeze’s state-of-the-art FILTER noise reduction technology. Powered by a specialized AI processor, it swiftly eliminates background noise, delivering crystal-clear interactions across any platform. Paired with a detachable boom mic and a built-in beamforming array, your voice comes through with unmatched clarity, ensuring your message is heard loud and clear every time.

settings.title: Experience Dolby Atmos Spatial Audio. Unparalleled Immersive Sound.
settings.content:
Immerse yourself in breathtaking sound, expertly crafted by the renowned team at Dolby Labs. Maxwell for Xbox comes with a pre-installed Dolby Atmos license, ready to activate on your device. Simply download the Dolby Access app to customize your spatial audio experience. Whether gaming or enjoying your favourite media, Maxwell elevates your audio journey with Dolby Atmos, delivering immersive sound across all compatible devices.
Note: To learn more about Spatial Audio click here.

settings.title: Multi-Band EQ System. Your Ideal Sound - Perfected.
settings.content: Experience personalised sound tailored to your preferences with Maxwell’s customisable multi-band EQ system. Whether you're gaming or exploring different music genres, adjust audio cues with presets designed for footsteps, competitive play, immersive experiences, and enhanced bass and treble. Save up to four custom EQ profiles, experiment with community settings, or create your own soundscapes using the Audeze HQ gaming app. The possibilities are limitless for crafting your perfect audio experience.

settings.title: Easily Adjustable Game-Chat Mix. Communication Simplified.
settings.content: Secure a tactical edge in every gaming session with Audeze headsets, designed to help you anticipate opponents' moves. Trusted by top professional gamers, these headsets deliver lightning-fast response times and pinpoint sound precision. Stay in sync with your team and catch every crucial call-out, thanks to the easily adjustable game-chat mix feature compatible with PC, Macs, and consoles. With Audeze, dive into an immersive gaming experience and hear your adversaries before they even see you.

settings.title: Windows, Mac, Playstation, Xbox, Android or iOS. It Just Works.
settings.content: Audeze Maxwell offers seamless integration with a variety of gaming consoles and mobile devices, including Android and iOS smartphones. Whether you're on Windows or Mac, you can connect Maxwell to your PC for an immersive gaming experience. It’s also compatible with popular consoles like Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch, each with tailored features for optimal performance. Enjoy the flexibility of using Audeze Maxwell across multiple devices and elevate your gaming adventures with ease.

settings.title: Spring-Steel Headband and Aluminium Yokes For Battle-Ready Durability & Comfort.
settings.content: Maxwell boasts a newly reinforced frame, crafted with high-grade aluminium yokes and a resilient spring steel headband, designed for durability and strength. Indulge in lasting comfort with plush memory foam earpads and a replaceable suspension strap, ensuring a personalised fit. The strengthened dual-chamber earcups offer excellent passive noise isolation, immersing you in pristine sound by blocking out external distractions.

settings.title: Seamless Gameplay With Ultra-low Latency Wireless Connectivity
settings.content: Game with unwavering assurance, benefiting from stable connectivity and an impressive 3X range compared to standard 2.4GHz wireless, ensuring you stay synchronised with the on-screen action. Immerse in exceptional lossless high-resolution audio, made possible by cutting-edge wireless technology supporting LC3plus, LE Audio, and LDAC. Effortlessly switch between multiple devices with the convenience of Bluetooth Multipoint, adding versatility to your gaming experience.

settings.title: Easy Compatibility With Gaming Consoles, Phones And Operating Systems
settings.content: Audeze Maxwell ensures effortless integration with a wide range of gaming consoles and mobile devices, including Android and iOS smartphones. Whether you're a Windows or Mac user, you can connect the Audeze Maxwell to your PC for an immersive gaming experience. The compatibility extends to popular gaming consoles such as Xbox, Sony Playstation, and Nintendo Switch, with customised feature sets for each platform. Enjoy the flexibility of using Audeze Maxwell across multiple devices and conquer your gaming adventures with ease.

settings.title: Earcups
settings.content: Immerse yourself fully in your gaming experience, as the reinforced dual-chamber earcups provide top-notch passive noise reduction, allowing you to shut out the outside world and focus on the game.

settings.title: Detachable Boom Microphone
settings.content: Audeze Maxwell is embedded with a Detachable Boom Microphone featuring hypercardioid reducing physical and AI noise reduction for effective communication.

The highlights for the headset come from its battery life, vivid and useful imaging, satisfying balance, very solid connections and microphone clarity. Crisp highs that adds a satisfying tactile element for gaming.
The Audeze Maxwell wireless gaming headset offers some of the cleanest, most audiophile-pleasing sound you can get in the category thanks to its planar magnetic drivers.
It services both my desire for wireless freedom and my pretentious audiophile pretentions, and it's just the best aural experience you're going to get in a gaming headset.

The Audeze Maxwell is a fantastic-sounding detailed gaming headset that has a wide soundstage, accurate imaging, and long battery life. Clear, detailed and decently-balanced, Wide and immersive soundstage.
The Maxwell has fantastic drivers, excellent battery life, and impressive wireless range. But it’s also got some issues. It’s also surprisingly comfortable, and its 80+ hour battery life.
Audeze's latest headset is its best offering for gamers yet, with a much nicer design and seriously superb sound, married to great battery life.

settings.title: What is Audeze Maxwell like on the whole?
settings.content: The Audeze Maxwell is a gaming headphone designed to be a perfect match for someone looking to elevate their gaming experience.

settings.title: Will the Xbox Audeze Maxwell work with PlayStation (or vice versa)?
settings.content: Either version is universally compatible using the 3.5mm connection. In low-latency wireless mode or via USB, due to differing hardware, firmware, and licensing requirements, the PlayStation version will not work on Xbox. Xbox version on PlayStation via the USB dongle is not officially supported and may not work. Using the Xbox version on PS via wired USB, there may be some limitations in volume control and other possible loss of functionality. We recommend use of the properly supported version for each console.

settings.title: What improvements does Audeze Maxwell have over Audeze Penrose?
settings.content: Maxwell offers several significant advancements over Penrose. Maxwell has an improved chassis using premium materials for improved durability, a greatly extended battery life (greater than 80 hours from our testing), utilizes the new Bluetooth 5.3 protocol for better wireless range and stability, and allows for hi-res audio playback through its USB mode.

settings.title: As a PC only user, which would be the best version, Xbox or PlayStation Audeze Maxwell?
settings.content: Both the Xbox version as well as the PlayStation version will function identically for PC use. In this case, you can save a bit of money by choosing the PlayStation version. The Xbox version includes a Dolby Atmos license to use specifically with the headset. Note: Existing Dolby Atmos licenses purchased separately through the Microsoft app store, will work with both versions of Maxwell.

settings.title: Why are the drivers 90mm instead of 100mm like the Audeze Mobius/Penrose?
settings.content: The active area is still same. The new dual chamber earcup design takes up some of the space by having two physical earcups, one internal and one external - this helps with noise isolation and acoustics.

settings.title: What are the inner ear dimensions for the ear pads on Maxwell?
settings.content:
Maxwell has an ear opening on the pads that are:65mm tall x 50mm wide x 30mm deep (back side) and 20mm deep (front side).
Note: that there may be some slight tolerance differences on a per-pad basis.
